Test Name: Epstein-Barr Virus (EBV) Susceptibility and Lymphoproliferative Disorders Gene Panel
Specimen Type: Peripheral blood (whole blood) or extracted DNA
Purpose: To detect genetic markers associated with EBV susceptibility and lymphoproliferative disorders using qPCR analysis.
Equipment: Centrifuge, thermal cycler for qPCR, vortex mixer, pipettes, refrigerated microcentrifuge
